title: ICEYE delivers flood insights from recent hurricanes to FEMA in collaboration with New Light Technologies and Bana Solutions
key_assets: ['flood extent and depth data', 'SAR satellite constellation', 'near real-time flood monitoring capabilities']
summary: ICEYE has delivered critical flood insights to FEMA through a collaboration with New Light Technologies (NLT) and Bana Solutions. The partnership leverages ICEYE’s SAR satellite constellation to provide near real-time flood data, supporting FEMA’s emergency response efforts during recent hurricanes and flood events.
why_it_matters: This partnership demonstrates the growing importance of SAR satellite data in disaster response and emergency management. ICEYE’s technology enables faster and more accurate decision-making during natural catastrophes, potentially saving lives and optimizing federal response efforts.
